body_html:
@varunkumar3618

Please check out #7951 , which acknowledges the deficiency here and proposes an enhancement moving forwards. Please add any use-cases onto that issue, so we can collect them in one place!

Since I believe this issue was intended as a feature request, I'm closing it out so that we can focus on the other one. If I've made a mistake in this regard, feel free to ping this issue and I'll re-open it. Thanks!
